org.youscope.plugin.matlabscripting

Class RemoteMatlabProxyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.youscope.plugin.matlabscripting.RemoteMatlabProxyFactory

  • public class RemoteMatlabProxyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this class to create instances of RemoteMatlabProxy. Each proxy will control a different instance of MATLAB. Confirmed to work on OS X, Windows, & Linux. If your operating system is not reported as OS X, it will launch it as if it were on Windows or Linux (they are handled exactly the same).
    Author:
    Joshua Kaplan

    • Method Detail

      • setMatlabLocation

        public void setMatlabLocation(java.lang.String matlabLocation)
        Set the location of the MATLAB program. If this property is not set an appropriate default for your operating system will be used. If that fails, then use this method to give the correct location.
        Parameters:
        matlabLocation -

      • requestProxy

        public void requestProxy()
                  throws MatlabConnectionException
        Requests a proxy. When the proxy has been made (there is a possibility it will not be if errors occur), all listeners will be notified.
        Throws:
        MatlabConnectionException
        See Also:
        getProxy(), addConnectionListener(MatlabConnectionListener)

      • getProxy

        public RemoteMatlabProxy getProxy()
                           throws MatlabConnectionException
        Calling this method will get a RemoteMatlabProxy. This will take some time as it involves launching MATLAB. If for any reason a connection cannot be established, this method will timeout in 60 seconds or the amount of time as specified by setTimeout(int).
        Returns:
        proxy
        Throws:
        MatlabConnectionException
        See Also:
        requestProxy()

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int ms)
        Sets the maximum amount of time to wait in attempting to setup a connection to MATLAB in milliseconds. The default value is 60 seconds.
        Parameters:
        ms -

      • addConnectionListener

        public void addConnectionListener(MatlabConnectionListener listener)
        Add a listener to be notified when MATLAB connections are established and lost.
        Parameters:
        listener -

      • removeConnectionListener

        public void removeConnectionListener(MatlabConnectionListener listener)
        Removes a listener so that it is no longer notified.
        Parameters:
        listener -
